Count down to Valentine's Day with our Hershey's Kisses brand milk chocolates.
You'll need round label sheets, Hershey's Kisses...
...and a sweetie who needs a little pick-me-up.
In the days leading to Valentine's Day, leave your loved ones a special note.
Write your message on a label.
Next, peel and stick right to the bottom of your Hershey's treat.
